newsitem.title: USA: U.S. HEADLINE STOCKS - Issues to watch.
newsitem.headline: U.S. HEADLINE STOCKS - Issues to watch.

text.p: * Intel Corp is expected to report fourth quarter earnings per share of $1.84, up from $0.98 a year ago, according to First Call. Intel's results are due after the close of trading. The stock finished at 146-7/8 Monday.
* Federal National Mortgage Association is expected to report fourth quarter earnings per share of $0.65, up from $0.58 a year ago, according to First Call. The stock closed at 38-5/8.
* Bay Networks Inc is expected to report second quarter earnings per share of $0.23, compared to $0.36 a year ago, according to First Call. The stock closed at 22-1/2.

* Hillenbrand Industries Inc reported fourth quarter earnings per share of $0.56, up from $0.12 a year ago, which included a charge of $0.37. The First Call estimate was $0.54. The stock closed at 38-1/2.
